name: #Funtime
description: Funtime is an arcade style twin stick shooter that is easy to pick up but difficult to master. Shooting isn't your only weapon as you fight through waves of colorful enemies all while climbing the leaderboard.<br/><br/><ul><li> Over 50 challenging levels, all with individual leaderboards<br/></li><li> 8 unique game modes<br/></li><li> Deep scoring system and replayability<br/></li><li> Color swapping metagame<br/></li><li> Original soundtrack with beat-synced levels<br/></li><li> Easily load custom music</li></ul>
